Article Title: ‘Opportunity for us’: RBI governor Sanjay Malhotra sees impact of Trump tariffs as ‘minimal’; says ‘should be able to come out of this stronger’
Article Text:
US President Donald Trump in August imposed 50% tariffs on Indian exports to America, 25% of which are for India’s crude oil imports from Russia. (AI image)

RBI Slashes Rates After Rupee Fall, Boosts Liquidity And Lifts India’s GDP Forecast To 7.3%

How much have US tariffs hit the Indian economy? What RBI said

Also See:

RBI MPC meet: RBI governor Sanjay Malhotra is of the view that the tariffs imposed on Indian exports are an opportunity for the sector. In a post RBI policy press conference, Malhotra told reporters that the impact of tariffs has been ‘minimal’. US President Donald Trump in August imposed 50% tariffs on Indian exports to America, 25% of which are for India’s crude oil imports from Russia.India and the US have resumed discussions for a bilateral trade agreement, but the former has drawn its red lines on sensitive sectors like agriculture and dairy, while at the same time stressing on its strategic autonomy in deciding its sources of energy procurement.Asked about the impact of tariffs, the RBI governor said, “It's a minimal impact. It's not a very high impact because ours is mostly a domestic demand driven economy.”Also Read | MPC meet: Low inflation, high growth - why did RBI still cut repo rate? Sanjay Malhotra explains While acknowledging that some sectors have been hit, Sanjay Malhotra expressed confidence in diversifying.“A few sectors are certainly impacted by it. We have given out relief packages. The government of India has also given out a relief package,” he said.According to the central bank governor, the tariffs are an opportunity.“I think this is an opportunity for us. Exporters have already started looking out, improving, not only, their productivity but diversifying, etc. We should be able to come out of this stronger going forward,” he said.India's exports to the United States, its biggest overseas market, have declined significantly due to substantial increases in tariffs. During the period from May to October 2025, exports dropped by 28.5%, decreasing from $8.83 billion to $6.31 billion.The reduction occurred after the United States implemented a series of heightened tariffs, starting with 10% on April 2, escalating to 25% on August 7, and culminating at 50% by end-August—resulting in Indian products facing some of the highest tax rates amongst all US trade partners
Article Summary: Us president donald trump in august imposed 50% tariffs on indian exports to america, 25% of which are for india’s crude oil imports from russia. While acknowledging that some sectors have been hit, sanjay malhotra expressed confidence in diversifying.

Article Title: GTA Online A Safehouse in the Hills DLC: Michael returns, new mansions, and more
Article Text:
Image via Rockstar Games

Michael De Santa returns in GTA Online A Safehouse in the Hills DLC



Luxury Mansions arrive in GTA Online



Tongva Hills

Richman

Near Vinewood

The long-awaited winter update for GTA Online, titled “A Safehouse in the Hills” DLC, is almost here. It arrives on December 10, 2025, and delivers one of the most significant character returns in the game’s history.This update is set to be much more than just a content pack, and it is a nostalgic trip that will bring back the iconic Michael De Santa into GTA Online. Besides the character’s return, the update also enables you to buy luxury mansions in the game.Here are all the details that you need to know about GTA Online’s A Safehouse in the Hills DLC.Michael's return is monumental for longtime fans of the franchise, given his absence was noticeable after GTA 5 concluded. The natural assumption for everyone was that Michael had achieved the retired Hollywood life he always desired. Nevertheless, the latest reveal trailer for A Safehouse in the Hills confirms that this theory is out the window.The trailer showcases an older Michael with white hair, suggesting that time has passed. However, he still possesses the volatile personality that defines him. This shows that he has aged, but has certainly not mellowed from his previous lifestyle.Michael's wife, Amanda De Santa, is also confirmed to appear, tying the protagonist's return to his infamously chaotic family life.While Rockstar has not given a full explanation of his role, Michael will likely be assisting players with new content centered on the mansions. There will possibly be a series of connected missions, or he will be simply providing advice.A Safehouse in the Hills DLC is launching on December 10, 2025, and it marks the first time you can purchase full-scale luxury mansions in GTA Online. These high-end properties are available for purchase in the coveted areas of Los Santos:These mansions are designed to make a full-power statement, featuring an array of luxury amenities: pools, helipads, hot tubs, garages, and expansive driveways. Inside them, you will also gain access to functional rooms like arcades, armories, vehicle workshops, and display podiums for their prized vehicles.Michael De Santa's involvement points towards the update being more focused on detailed storytelling and experience than what Rockstar typically releases. This would make A Safehouse in the Hills DLC among the best releases in GTA Online’s history.
Article Summary: The long-awaited winter update for gta online, titled “a safehouse in the hills” dlc, is almost here. It arrives on december 10, 2025, and delivers one of the most significant character returns in the game’s history. This update is set to be much more than just a content pack, and it is a nostalgic trip that will bring back the iconic michael de santa into gta online.

Article Title: Patrick Mahomes vs. Travis Kelce earnings 2025: Salary breakdown, contracts, and who comes out on top
Article Text:
Image via Imagn

Patrick Mahomes vs. Travis Kelce Net worth comparison

Patrick Mahomes vs. Travis Kelce: NFL contract earnings and salary in 2025





Patrick Mahomes vs. Travis Kelce: Endorsements and business ventures

Who comes out ahead?

Also Read

Kansas City Chiefs stars Patrick Mahomes and Travis Kelce continue to dominate the NFL headlines, both on the field and financially. As two of the most recognizable faces in the NFL, their careers have evolved beyond performance, extending into endorsements, investments, and long-term business ventures. With updated figures for 2025 now available, fans are comparing which teammate leads in earnings, salary structure, and overall net worth.While the two play very different roles in the Chiefs’ success, both have become global sports brands with rapidly growing financial portfolios.As of 2025, both Mahomes and Kelce hold an estimated net worth of around $90 million, according to Celebrity Net Worth. The figures show how close their financial standings currently are, despite Mahomes signing a significantly larger playing contract.Kelce’s wealth comes from a blend of long-term endorsements, business ventures, and consistent All-Pro performances. Meanwhile, Mahomes’ meteoric rise, combined with major investment activity and one of the largest contracts in NFL history, has helped him build wealth rapidly.Mahomes currently holds one of the most lucrative deals in league history, a 10-year extension worth over $450 million, signed in 2020.His contract is structured with roster bonuses, proration adjustments, and incentives tied to MVP and championship performances. For the 2025 season, Mahomes’ base salary sits at $1,255,000, with over $21 million in prorated bonuses added to his cap figure.Kelce, on the other hand, signed a two-year, $34.25 million extension in 2024, which keeps him with the Chiefs through 2025. He earns an average annual salary of $17,125,500, including guarantees and roster bonuses. His 2025 season marks one of the most financially rewarding phases of his career.Mahomes and Kelce are also among the NFL’s most marketable athletes. Mahomes represents major brands including Adidas, State Farm, Subway, and Oakley. He also owns stakes in multiple sports franchises, including the Kansas City Royals and Sporting KC.Kelce’s endorsements include Nike, T-Mobile, Papa John’s, Walgreens, and Old Spice. He has also invested in brands such as Hydrow and Kodiak and has launched products including Hilo Gummies and his clothing brand, Tru Kolors.Mahomes leads in long-term potential earnings due to the size of his contract and expanding investment portfolio. Kelce, however, remains close in total net worth and continues to gain business opportunities and media visibility.For now, the financial battle remains nearly neck-and-neck - much like their chemistry on the field.
Article Summary: Kansas city chiefs stars patrick mahomes and travis kelce dominate the nfl headlines, both on the field and financially. With updated figures for 2025 now available, fans are comparing which teammate leads in earnings, salary structure, and overall net worth.

Article Title: NHL Trade Rumor: Canadiens, Oilers linked to Sabres’ Ukko-Pekka Luukkonen as they eye goalie trade
Article Text:
Trade buzz grows as Sabres weigh next move with Ukko-Pekka Luukkonen (Image via: Getty Images)

Buffalo Sabres expected to move Ukko-Pekka Luukkonen, as Montreal and Edmonton show interest

LUUUUUUUUK! Ukko-Pekka Luukkonen Highlights From 2024-25 Buffalo Sabres Season

Also read:

As the Buffalo Sabres continue to carry with their three goalies on their active roster, which includes Ukko-Pekka Luukkonen, Alex Lyon, and Colten Ellis, the goaltending situation at the team might change as the team may be approaching a turning point. Reports suggest that Sabres general manager Kevyn Adams will have to make at least one goaltending move, and probably two, before the next season clears out the logjam.Meanwhile, rumors are doing the rounds that the Montreal Canadiens and the Edmonton Oilers have emerged as potential trading partners for Sabres goalie Luukkonen. While the situation remains uncertain, the interest appears serious, with both teams reportedly monitoring the situation closely. Let’s take a close look at the speculations that are currently hovering around the team.The Buffalo Sabres are still operating with three goaltenders, however, the setup may not last much longer, as the Buffalo Sabres are expected to move Ukko-Pekka Luukkonen.As per reports, the Montreal Canadiens and Edmonton Oilers have reportedly shown interest in Luukonen, and it has also come to light that the general manager, Kevyn Adams, is expected to make possibly two goalie-related moves before next season to resolve the growing roster congestion.Meanwhile, David Pagnotta of the Fourth Period stated, "This may be something to look at around the draft... and this isn't the first time UPL's name has come up. But with what's going on in Buffalo, with who they've got right now, with Levi coming up, I think there's an appetite to seriously look at moving him again."At the start of the 2025-26 campaign, Luukkonen missed several matches because of injury. He has compiled a 2.51 goals against average and a .899 save percentage across eight games (seven starts) this season.According to the NHL , Luukkonen has signed a $23.75 million extension deal through 2028-29 after a 2023–24 campaign that saw a 2.57 goals-against average (GAA) and .910 save percentage that made him a promising rising star in the league.However, his recent form has been very inconsistent as the goaltender has posted a 2.51 GAA and .899 save percentage in the 2025–26 season so far, across eight games (seven starts). Meanwhile, over the past two seasons, his combined save percentage has dipped to .888, and he ranks near the bottom of active NHL goaltenders as well, which is making the analysts believe that trading Ukko-Pekka Luukkonen will be good for the Buffalo Sabres to create opportunity between the pipes.
Article Summary: Buffalo sabres expected to move ukko-pekka luukkonen, as montreal and edmonton show interest. Reports suggest that sabres general manager kevyn adams will have to make at least one goaltending move, and probably two, before the next season clears out the logjam. Montreal canadiens and edmonton oilers have emerged as potential trading partners.

Article Title: “I can count on that”: Inside Linus Sebastian's business empire as YouTuber breaks down how his tech channel really makes money
Article Text:
Linus Sebastian (via YouTube/ Linus Tech Tips)

Linus breaks down the $26M figure, revenue mix, and why predictable income matters for creators who operate like companies

He Made $26M on YouTube...But Nearly Lost It All (Linus Tech Tips Interview)





Popular tech YouTuber Linus Sebastian recently offered a rare insight into the financial earnings and business strategies behind his uber successful channel Linus Tech Tips. In a new interview with Jon Youshaei, Sebastian opened up not just staggering numbers the channel has pulled in, but also about the financial infrastructure that keeps Linus Media Group stable and evolving with time.The conversation clearly shows how Sebastian's sharp wit and intellect shaped his empire. One can witness the inspirational journey of how a channel with nine billion lifetime views has slowly evolved into a multi-stream business that does not solely depend on ads. The company is currently thriving, and Sebastian credits his supporters for all it has achieved so far.At the four-minute mark of Youshaei’s video, Sebastian invited him into his YouTube Studio dashboard. That’s when Youshaei started reading out the staggering achievements of Sebastian’s channel, including nine billion lifetime views, reaching a peak of 8.4 million views in a single day, and “over $26.3 million” earned through AdSense.When asked if the $26.3 million was made through his individual effort, Sebastian quickly clarified that it was made possible through the company. He said, “I haven’t. Linus Media Group, Inc. has done $26 million in revenue through YouTube AdSense… Linus Media Group has paid more than $26 million in salaries.”Later in the video, the pair went deeper into the channel’s revenue breakdown, including from YouTube Adsense (11.6%), Fully Branded Videos (12.5%), Products (55.4%), Memberships (7.2%), Sponsorships (9.2%), etc. Sebastian gave a shoutout to his supporters who have been substantial in his success story, stating,He stated, “Those are from our incredible supporters… And we have over 40,000 of them right now.And they’re awesome, and I can count on that. YouTube AdSense, I can count on that to a degree, but it’s more volatile.” He also added that FloatPlane “never has a spike, but it never really has a big dip. It's been pretty consistent growth overall.”Interestingly, this new interview comes months after Sebastian acknowledged a drop in the channel’s viewership in September 2025. Rather than seeing it as a setback, Sebastian continued to work hard, strategized ways to battle fluctuation and come back strong, ultimately building his business to new heights.Also read: Why are fans questioning Pokimane’s relationship status amid celibacy rumors? Her latest statement sparks huge buzz
Article Summary: Popular tech youtuber linus sebastian recently offered a rare insight into the financial earnings and business strategies behind his channel linus tech tips. Sebastian opened up not just staggering numbers the channel has pulled in, but also about the financial infrastructure that keeps linus media group stable and evolving with time.

Article Title: Aryna Sabalenka and Georgios Frangulis combined net worth: Tennis earnings, endorsements, business, relationship and more
Article Text:
Aryna Sabalenka and Georgios Frangulis combined net worth: Tennis earnings, endorsements, business, relationship and more (Image via Getty)

Aryna Sabalenka net worth and tennis money

Aryna Sabalenka endorsements and brand deals



Georgios Frangulis business and personal wealth

Aryna Sabalenka and Georgios Frangulis combined wealth and lifestyle

Aryna Sabalenka and Georgios Frangulis recent public moment

Aryna Sabalenka and her boyfriend, Georgios Frangulis, are a very successful couple. She makes big money from tennis and top brand deals, and he earns from his fast-growing açaí company, Oakberry. Their exact combined net worth is not shared by any official source, but trusted reports say they are worth many millions together. Fans often see Georgios at her matches, and both are doing very well in their own careers.Aryna Sabalenka is one of the highest-paid players on the WTA Tour. Forbes and other top sports sites say her net worth is in the high-teen millions in 2025.The WTA and financial sources report she has earned over 32–34 million dollars in prize money in her career. Her biggest wins came from the Australian Open and strong runs at the US Open, which helped her join the top group of all-time women’s tennis earners.Aryna Sabalenka makes strong money off the court too. She has major deals with Nike for clothes, Wilson for racquets, and other partners like Whoop and Master & Dynamic.Reports from track athlete earnings say she makes millions each year from sponsors. In many seasons, her sponsor money is almost the same as her tennis prize money.These deals help keep her personal net worth well above 15 million dollars.Georgios Frangulis is the founder and CEO of Oakberry, a global açaí bowl and smoothie brand. Oakberry has grown very fast and now has hundreds of stores across many countries.The company has raised more than 100 million dollars, including a 67 million dollar Series C round led by BTG Pactual funds. Oakberry’s full value and Georgios’ exact net worth are private. But trusted business sites say he holds a large share in the company, placing him in the multi-million-dollar range.When you add Aryna Sabalenka’s confirmed high-teen-million net worth and Georgios’ Oakberry stake, their combined worth sits safely in the tens of millions of dollars.No official outlet shares a fixed number because Oakberry is privately owned. Still, their travel, training work, and global business growth show a strong financial life. Georgios is often seen in her player box at big tournaments, and Aryna Sabalenka supports his brand as it expands in the US and other countries.In 2025, fans noticed Georgios Frangulis sitting very calm and serious during Aryna Sabalenka’s close matches. His quiet look became a fun talking point online. Aryna later joked about it, saying he looks “too focused” at times.Media outlets also wrote this year that he brings a steady and peaceful energy to her life as she competes near the top of the WTA rankings, adding more interest to their love story and wealth distributions.Also Read: Aryna Sabalenka Boyfriend Georgios Frangulis Shows Strong Support After She Shares Raw Season Ending Note
Article Summary: Aryna sabalenka is one of the highest-paid players on the wta tour. She has earned over 32–34 million dollars in prize money in her career. Georgios frangulis is the founder and ceo of oakberry, a global açaí bowl and smoothie brand.

Article Title: NHL updates: Carolina Hurricanes owner Tom Dundon selling team stake for over $2 billion
Article Text:
Tom Dundon, left, owner of the Carolina Hurricanes, speaks to media before an NHL game against the New York Rangers (Credit: Getty News)

Tom Dundon plans $2 billion Hurricanes sale for Trailblazers for $4 billion



Carolina Hurricanes owner Tom Dundon is once again making headlines in the NHL news roundup after reports revealed that he is close to divesting a large portion of his ownership stake in the Hurricanes. This potential sale, valued at over $2 billion, comes as Dundon looks to buy the NBA’s Portland Trailblazers for $4 billion, according to insider Mike Ozanian. The news has quickly become one of the biggest NHL updates of the week, given the massive money involved and the potential ripple effects across two major American sports leagues.Dundon, who purchased the Carolina Hurricanes in 2017 for approximately $420 million, has overseen one of the franchise’s most successful modern stretches. Under his tenure, the Hurricanes have become a perennial playoff contender. Thus, reshaping their culture and increasing their league-wide visibility.The reported $2 billion valuation marks a staggering financial leap for the franchise, reflecting the hockey world’s booming economics. NHL match today values look drastically different compared to just a decade ago, when teams like the Hurricanes were worth a fraction of their current price.Dundon’s move into NBA ownership aligns with his reputation for ambitious business decisions. Thus, raising questions about whether he will fully exit the NHL or retain a minority stake.For Hurricanes fans, the biggest concern is stability. A shift in ownership could influence player negotiations, front-office leadership, and upcoming NHL match previews as the team navigates long-term roster building.As NHL trade rumors swirl and the business side of the sport continues evolving, one thing is clear: Tom Dundon’s decision marks one of the most significant ownership developments in recent NHL history, with implications that extend well beyond Raleigh.Also Read: NHL Update: Brad Marchand and his family hosts Thanksgiving to comfort teammates missing home
Article Summary: Carolina hurricanes owner tom dundon is close to divesting a large portion of his ownership stake in the hurricanes. This potential sale, valued at over $2 billion, comes as dundon looks to buy the nba’s portland trailblazers for $4 billion, according to insider mike ozanian.

Article Title: Top 10 richest UFC fighters in 2025: From Conor McGregor to Nate Diaz, who made the most?
Article Text:
(Image via Getty Images)

1. Conor McGregor - £170 million+

2. Khabib Nurmagomedov - £80 million

3. Georges St-Pierre - £60 million

4. Brock Lesnar - £55 million

5. Anderson Silva - £45 million

6. Ronda Rousey - £40 million

Fast & Furious

7. Tito Ortiz - £18 million

8. Chuck Liddell - £17 million



9. Jon Jones - £15 million



10. Nate Diaz - £12 million

The UFC has many big stars, but only a few fighters have turned their names into huge money. These fighters earn from fights, but they also earn from business deals, brand work, and other jobs outside the cage. As of 2025, some UFC fighters have made millions from wise choices and strong careers. Conor McGregor sits at the top of the list, earning much more than most fighters in the UFC. Right behind him are big names like Khabib Nurmagomedov, Georges St-Pierre, and Anderson Silva. Fans are always curious about how these stars amassed their wealth and why they remain in the spotlight years later.This list breaks everything down in a clear and easy way. It looks at the ten richest UFC fighters right now, using recent numbers shared by Celebrity Net Worth and Forbes. So let’s go through the names and see how each fighter made their fortune.Conor McGregor is the richest UFC fighter today. He made most of his money from his whiskey brand sale and huge UFC fights. He also earns from his training program and brand deals. Conor’s fame outside the cage also brings him a high income. He appears in ads, launches new projects, and keeps growing his businesses. His name alone attracts huge attention, which helps him make even more money every year.Khabib retired unbeaten. He made a significant amount of money from pay-per-view fights and now earns a living from coaching. After leaving the sport, he started Eagle FC and invests in gyms and tech companies. Fans trust him because of his clean career, so his businesses grow fast. He also travels for events and speaking work.GSP made money from title fights, movies, and brand work. He is still one of the most respected names in UFC history. Even in retirement, GSP stays active with fitness programs, interviews, and sports events. His calm personality and discipline help him land long-term deals. Many young fighters still look up to him as a true legend.Brock earned from UFC and WWE. His short UFC run still brought very high payouts. Brock’s colossal size and strong personality make him a major draw anywhere he goes. WWE continues to boost its income. Even without many UFC fights, his crossover fame keeps his annual earnings high.Anderson earned from a long UFC career and later from boxing fights and TV work. After leaving the UFC, he stayed busy with big boxing events that paid very well. His smooth style and loyal fans help him get roles in shows and media. He remains a respected figure worldwide.Ronda made money from UFC, WWE, and movies like. She was the first big female star in UFC. Her rise changed women’s MMA forever. She later moved to WWE and became a top name there too. Ronda also earns from books, brand deals, and public speaking. Her influence still shapes women’s sports.Tito earned from early UFC success, fight promotions, and business deals. Tito was one of the first UFC stars to get mainstream attention. He later ran his own promotions and stayed active in public life. His long career, even outside fighting, continues to bring him steady income.Chuck was a huge name in the early 2000s. He now earns from TV shows and speaking events. Fans remember him for his knockout power and strong personality. Chuck still appears at UFC events and fan gatherings. He also works with brands and does motivational talks, which keep his earnings growing.Jon earned millions from title fights and sponsorships. His move to heavyweight brought even bigger payouts. Even with ups and downs, Jon remains one of the most talented fighters ever. His fights draw massive attention. When he competes, PPV sales jump, helping him earn far more than most active champions today.Nate built a strong fan base. He earns from big fights, his own merchandise, and his new fight company, Real Fight Inc. Nate’s honest, real style makes fans support him no matter what. His boxing events, clothing line, and public appearances add to his earnings. He also promotes young fighters through his new company.Also Read: Austin Reeves’ adorable bromance with Luka Doncic featuring hilarious request steals spotlight after Los
Article Summary: Conor mcgregor sits at the top of the list, earning much more than most fighters in the ufc. Right behind him are big names like khabib nurmagomedov, georges st-pierre, and anderson silva. These fighters earn from fights, but they also earn from business deals, brand work, and other jobs outside the cage.

Article Title: Cloudflare Outage: Cloudflare goes down again: Users report facing issues with multiple apps
Article Text:
Global internet services faced disruptions as Cloudflare experienced a significant outage, impacting popular platforms like Zerodha and Canva. Users worldwide reported access issues. Cloudflare confirmed the problem, stating it was investigating and later announced a fix had been implemented. The company has since declared the incident resolved, restoring critical online functionalities.

Update: The company has confirmed that the outage has been resolved.

(Developing story)





Cloudflare’s services are experiencing another outage, with users worldwide reporting issues accessing multiple apps. The blackout is affecting several websites, including Zerodha, Canva and Downdetector, and has left many people unable to use critical online services. The company's service status page noted: "Cloudflare is investigating issues with Cloudflare Dashboard and related APIs. Customers using the Dashboard / Cloudflare APIs are impacted as requests might fail and/or errors may be displayed. We are continuing to investigate this issue."During the outage, the company said: "A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. We are continuing to monitor the results."Cloudflare's status page also noted: "Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary."The company's CTO Dane Knecht took to microblogging site X (formerly Twitter) to confirm:"We are aware of the issue impacting the availability of Cloudflare’s network.It was not an attack; root cause was disabling some logging to help mitigate this week’s React CVE. Will share full details in a blog post today. Sites should be back online now, but I understand the frustration this causes and the work being."During the outage several users also shared reports and memes about the latest Cloudflare outage. The outage affected apps like Canva, Zerodha and Groww.This is the second time in a month when the IT infrastructre company faced a major outage. Last month, the outage affected major platforms including ChatGPT, Spotify and US President Donald Trump's social media site Truth Social.Cloudflare is an important for the internet as it supports much of the traffic. It helps websites stay online during heavy traffic and protects them from cyberattacks. It sits between users and websites, improving speed and security. As many businesses depend on Cloudflare, even a single issue in its system can cause many unrelated websites to go down at the same time.
Article Summary: Cloudflare's services are experiencing another outage, with users worldwide reporting issues accessing multiple apps. The blackout is affecting several websites, including zerodha, canva and downdetector. Users worldwide reported access issues. Cloudflare confirmed the problem, stating it was investigating and later announced a fix had been implemented.

Article Title: Alan Dye: Meta hires longtime Apple design VP Alan Dye, read CEO Mark Zuckerberg's 'welcome note'
Article Text:
Alan Dye, attending a GQ even last month, is leaving Apple for Meta.

Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg welcome note

I'm excited to welcome Alan and Billy to Meta to work with me, Boz, and our team to drive this important work forward.

We're entering a new era where AI glasses and other devices will change how we connect with technology and each other. The potential is enormous, but what matters most is making these experiences feel natural and truly centered around people. With this new studio, we're focused on making every interaction thoughtful, intuitive, and built to serve people.

Alan will be joined by Billy Sorrentino, another acclaimed design lead from Apple; Joshua To, who has led our interface design across Reality Labs; our industrial design team led by Pete Bristol; and our metaverse design and art teams led by Jason Rubin.

The new studio will bring together design, fashion, and technology to define the next generation of our products and experiences. Our idea is to treat intelligence as a new design material and imagine what becomes possible when it is abundant, capable, and human-centered. We plan to elevate design within Meta, and pull together a talented group with a combination of craft, creative vision, systems thinking, and deep experience building iconic products that bridge hardware and software,” wrote Zuckerberg.

Dye’s legacy at Apple





Facebook-parent Meta has announced the appointment of Alan Dye, one of Apple ’s most influential design leaders. Dye will head the newly created creative studio inside its Reality Labs division. Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg made this announcement on social media platform Threads. Dye who has been instrumental in shaping Apple’s design language since past two decades will now help Meta in defining the “next generation of products and experiences” as the company pushes deeper into AI-powered devices and spatial computing.In his announcement, Zuckerberg said the new studio will merge design, fashion, and technology, treating intelligence as “a new design material” to imagine what becomes possible when it is abundant, capable, and human-centered.Dye played an important role in shaping Apple’s design journey. Since taking over Apple’s design studio in 2015, he helped shape the look and feel of flagship products including the Apple Watch, iPhone X, and the Vision Pro headset. Most recently, he oversaw Liquid Glass, Apple’s new interface design that gives UI elements a transparent, fluid aesthetic.Bloomberg, which first reported his move, noted that Dye’s team also worked on upcoming smart home hardware.
Article Summary: Alan dye, one of apple’s most influential design leaders, is leaving apple for meta. Dye will head the newly created creative studio inside its reality labs division. He will be joined by billy sorrentino, another acclaimed design lead from apple.

Article Title: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei admits companies are overspending on AI and it poses risk, but ...
Article Text:
Amodei separates technology from economics



Anthropic revenue grows 10x annually: Amodei







Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei has spoken on the highly discussed massive spending in the intelligence space. Speaking at this year's DealBook Summit, Amodei addressed concerns about whether hundreds of billions of dollars being poured into AI data centres will pay off. He acknowledged that the industry is taking on “considerable risk” by such a splash out on infrastructure, but expressed confidence that the technology will ultimately deliver economic value.Replying to a question on overspending and whether “the math of all of this makes sense,” Amodei drew a distinction between technological and economic considerations.“So this is really complicated, and I want to separate out the technological side of it from the economic side of it," Amodei said.“On the technological side of it, I feel really solid. I think I'm one of the most bullish people around, and I think it pencils out,” he added. He highlighted that as models are trained using relatively simple methods with minor modifications, “they get better and better at every task under the sun.”Amodei pointed to Anthropic’s own performance as evidence of AI's economic potential. He said the company focuses heavily on enterprise clients and serves as a reliable indicator of the technology's value.“We look at our revenue. It's grown 10x a year, every year for the last three years,” Amodei said, suggesting that the company may be “a purer barometer than the others, which filter through consumers, which kind of have their habits and their use cases.”While acknowledging uncertainty about whether the explosive growth will continue, Amodei expressed confidence in the long-term trajectory. “Will it continue? I don't know. But the technology is driving there and the economic value is coming with it,” he said.He also predicted that the current growth trend “is going to slow down for sure, but it's still going to be really fast.”
Article Summary: Amodei separates technology from economics at dealbook summit. Anthropic revenue grows 10x annually: amodei. “will it continue? I don't know. But the technology is driving there and the economic value is coming with it,” he said.

Article Title: “It was Erika....”: Candace Owens questions whether Erika Kirk authorized TPUSA livestream plans and controversial message
Article Text:
Candace Owens has escalated her dispute with Turning Point USA, now targeting Erika Kirk, widow of the late founder. Owens alleges Kirk orchestrated a controversial livestream attempt, accusing TPUSA of changing terms and controlling the narrative. This public rift within the conservative movement raises questions about leadership and transparency at TPUSA, with neither side showing signs of backing down.

Candace Owens alleges that Erika Kirk orchestrated TPUSA livestream drama





The heated clash between conservative commentator Candace Owens and Turning Point USA has taken an unexpected turn, with Owens now aiming her criticism directly at Erika Kirk, the widow of the late TPUSA founder Charlie Kirk . What began as a disagreement over scheduling a livestream to address Owens’ allegations about Kirk’s killing has now spilled into a conversation about leadership, transparency, and who is truly calling the shots at TPUSA.Owens insists she never backed out of speaking publicly, but claims the organization attempted to control the narrative by changing terms at the last minute and refusing to let her join virtually. Now she’s questioning Erika Kirk’s role in it all.The dispute escalated after TPUSA member Blake Neff claimed Owens declined their invitation to speak live on The Charlie Kirk Show. Neff argued the group was not “booking a guest” but simply offering Owens a chance to respond to accusations against her.Owens countered by saying TPUSA changed the conditions after she agreed, demanding she appear in person in Phoenix at a time that clashed with her own podcast. She maintains she was misled about both timing and format.She later announced that if TPUSA insisted on speaking during her regular streaming slot, she would not back down, writing, “It has been decided by the public that the best response for this is for my team to livestream your livestream and provide commentary.”Owens insisted she had never refused to speak, only refused to play by new rules imposed without discussion.Then came the statement that shocked many: Owens accused Erika Kirk of directing TPUSA to set up the livestream and push the confrontation forward. On her podcast and on X, Owens wrote, “TPUSA says it was Erika Kirk who directed them to host a livestream. Did she approve of the letter Blake read?” The question implied not only involvement, but responsibility for a message Owens considers misleading.Erika Kirk, now CEO of TPUSA, has not issued a response. With Owens continuing to suggest the organization betrayed Charlie Kirk’s legacy, the conservative movement finds itself facing a very public divide and neither side appears ready to back down.Also Read: Candace Owens accuses TPUSA of playing games with livestream invite, says the group hasn’t felt “sincere” since Charlie’s death
Article Summary: Conservative commentator candace owens has escalated her dispute with turning point usa, now targeting erika kirk. Owens alleges kirk orchestrated a controversial livestream attempt, accusing tpusa of changing terms and controlling the narrative. This public rift within the conservative movement raises questions about leadership and transparency at tpusa.

Article Title: Candace Owens accuses TPUSA of playing games with livestream invite, says the group hasn’t felt “sincere” since Charlie Kirk’s death
Article Text:
Candace Owens publicly accused Turning Point USA of misleading behavior regarding a livestream invitation. She claims the organization shifted requirements, demanding an in-person appearance and a swift response after initially offering a flexible arrangement. Owens expressed that this incident, coupled with a perceived lack of sincerity since Charlie Kirk's passing, has eroded her trust in TPUSA.

Candace Owens Explodes; Claims Tpusa Staffer Hid Charlie Kirk’s ‘Death Text’

Candace Owens says TPUSA changed the rules and then blamed her for refusing to appear





The tension between Candace Owens and Turning Point USA continues to build, and her latest comments suggest this is about more than politics or personality clashes. Owens is calling out the organization for what she sees as misleading behavior surrounding a livestream they invited her to join.What might seem like a simple scheduling issue has turned into a bigger conversation about trust and transparency inside TPUSA since the death of Charlie Kirk. Owens’ frustration is clear, and her latest post makes it sound like she believes something has changed within the group and not for the better.The back-and-forth started when TPUSA’s Blake Neff shared a post claiming Owens declined their offer to join a livestream conversation. Neff wrote, “She was given the opportunity to join and declined.” But Owens says that version of the story leaves out important details.According to her, the original offer didn’t demand an immediate response or an in-person appearance. She explained, “You literally said ‘we would SINCERELY welcome her participation in that livestream’ which you were clear your team would be streaming from your studio in Phoenix at a date that had not been decided.”Owens says the invitation suddenly shifted into strict requirements she never agreed to. “You never said, ‘she MUST be in-person for the stream and she MUST respond within 24 hours after we choose a date and time.’”What frustrates her most is what she sees as dishonesty in how TPUSA publicly presented the situation. She wrote, “There was nothing sincere about what you did following that announcement and you deserve the ratio you’re getting.”Owens then added something more personal: “Frankly, nothing has felt sincere about the organization since Charlie passed.”Her words cut deeper than a simple disagreement over logistics, suggesting grief, confusion, and trust issues are playing out in real time. This doesn’t look like a fight either side plans to end quietly.Also Read: Blake Neff rejects Candace Owens’ offer to join Charlie Kirk's TPUSA livestream virtually, pushes forward with Kirk livestream alone
Article Summary: Candace owens publicly accused turning point usa of misleading behavior regarding a livestream invitation. She claims the organization shifted requirements, demanding an in-person appearance and a swift response. Owens expressed that this incident, coupled with a perceived lack of sincerity since charlie kirk's passing, has eroded her trust in tpusa.

Article Title: A new jaguar spotted in Arizona points to progress in the endangered species' recovery
Article Text:
Photo credit- AP





The spots gave it away. Just like a human fingerprint, the rosette pattern on each jaguar is unique so researchers knew they had a new animal on their hands after reviewing images captured by a remote camera in southern Arizona.The University of Arizona Wild Cat Research and Conservation Center says it's the fifth big cat over the last 15 years to be spotted in the area after crossing the U.S.-Mexico border. The animal was captured by the camera as it visited a watering hole in November, its distinctive spots setting it apart from previous sightings."We're very excited. It signifies this edge population of jaguars continues to come here because they're finding what they need," Susan Malusa, director of the center's jaguar and ocelot project, said during an interview Thursday.The team is now working to collect scat samples to conduct genetic analysis and determine the sex and other details about the new jaguar, including what it likes to eat. The menu can include everything from skunks and javelina to small deer.As an indicator species, Malusa said the continued presence of big cats in the region suggests a healthy landscape but that climate change and border barriers can threaten migratory corridors.She explained that warming temperatures and significant drought increase the urgency to ensure connectivity for jaguars with their historic range in Arizona.More than 99% of the jaguar's range is found in Central and South America, and the few male jaguars that have been spotted in the U.S. are believed to have dispersed from core populations in Mexico, according to the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service. Officials have said that jaguar breeding in the U.S. has not been documented in more than 100 years.Federal biologists have listed primary threats to the endangered species as habitat loss and fragmentation along with the animals being targeted for trophies and illegal trade.The Fish and Wildlife Service issued a final rule in 2024, revising the habitat set aside for jaguars in response to a legal challenge. The area was reduced to about 1,000 square miles (2,590 square kilometers) in Arizona's Pima, Santa Cruz and Cochise counties.Recent detection data supports findings that a jaguar appears every few years, Malusa said, with movement often tied to the availability of water. When food and water are plentiful, there's less movement.In the case of Jaguar #5, she said it was remarkable that the cat kept returning to the area over a 10-day period. Otherwise, she described the animals as quite elusive."That's the message - that this species is recovering," Malusa said. "We want people to know that and that we still do have a chance to get it right and keep these corridors open."
Article Summary: The university of arizona wild cat research and conservation center says it's the fifth big cat over the last 15 years to be spotted in the area. The animal was captured by the camera as it visited a watering hole in november. The team is now working to collect scat samples to conduct genetic analysis.

Article Title: 'Netflix may become the Obama News Network': MAGA activist Laura Loomer's warning on Warner Bros acquisition
Article Text:
Laura Loomer’s warning: A new media empire under the Obamas

What is actually happening with the Warner Bros deal

Warner Bros film studios

HBO and HBO Max programming

DC Entertainment and its film and TV franchises

A vast international distribution and licensing network

A political flashpoint in a historic media shift





MAGA activist Laura Loomer has reignited controversy after warning that Netflix’s acquisition of Warner Bros Discovery could transform the streaming giant into what she calls the “Obama News Network. ” Her claims resurfaced shortly after Netflix announced on 5 December 2025 that it had reached an agreement to purchase Warner Bros Discovery’s studio and streaming assets in a deal valued between $72 billion and $83 billion. The merger, which includes HBO, Warner Bros Pictures and DC Entertainment, is one of the largest entertainment acquisitions in modern history.Netflix says the takeover will strengthen its global content strategy and give audiences a unified platform combining blockbuster franchises with premium drama and international originals. Critics, however, including Loomer, see deeper political implications.In a piece published on her website Loomered, Loomer argued that the Obamas have been quietly rebuilding political influence through their production company Higher Ground, which signed a multimillion-dollar content deal with Netflix in 2018. She claims that the Warner Bros Discovery purchase would expand their reach by placing HBO and other premium outlets under the same corporate umbrella as Higher Ground’s existing partnership with Netflix.According to Loomer, the Obamas’ increased public visibility in recent months is part of a calculated effort to prepare for what she describes as a significant consolidation of media power. She points to Michelle Obama’s recent media appearances and Barack Obama’s criticism of President Trump as signs of a coordinated re-emergence.Loomer also cites political donations made by senior Netflix figures. She highlights CEO Ted Sarandos’ fundraising history for Barack Obama and Democratic candidates, Reed Hastings’ financial contributions to Democrat-led political efforts, and Chief Content Officer Bela Bajaria’s involvement in Biden-Harris events. In Loomer’s view, these ties indicate that the merger would create a political and cultural pipeline aligned with Democratic interests.Higher Ground’s past productions, including Becoming, American Factory, Crip Camp, We the People and Leave the World Behind, are framed by Loomer as left-leaning content that reflects the Obamas’ worldview. She argues that these projects promote themes of grievance and structural injustice, which she believes signal a broader ideological agenda that could shape media narratives if Netflix secures control of Warner Bros Discovery’s studio and streaming assets.Loomer concludes that the acquisition would consolidate streaming, Hollywood production and prestige television under one dominant platform, a scenario she believes could influence political messaging ahead of future elections.Netflix’s acquisition of Warner Bros Discovery follows months of speculation and a multi-company bidding war that included Paramount and Comcast. The deal gives Netflix ownership of:CNN is not included among the assets being sold to Netflix. Warner Bros Discovery is planning to spin off its cable and linear networks, including CNN, into a separate company often referred to in reporting as Discovery Global. Those news and cable assets will remain distinct from the studio and streaming businesses that Netflix has agreed to acquire, so CNN will continue as a separate news business rather than becoming part of Netflix’s portfolio.The acquisition still requires regulatory approval in the US and Europe. Lawmakers, including Republican Congressman Darrell Issa, have raised concerns about the merger creating an entertainment monopoly. Industry groups are also questioning what this means for theatrical releases, creative independence and competition within the streaming market.Netflix has said it intends to maintain Warner Bros’ theatrical commitments and preserve HBO’s identity as a premium storytelling brand. The company argues that the merger will boost investment in large-scale productions and international content, citing recent examples such as the ambitious Argentine sci-fi series The Eternaut.While Loomer’s argument is rooted in political critique, the broader conversation reflects anxiety across multiple sectors. Traditional cinema advocates fear further decline in theatrical box office revenue. Creators are concerned about how algorithm-driven decisions might affect artistic risk-taking. Political commentators, meanwhile, are questioning the influence of corporate media consolidation on public discourse.What remains clear is that Netflix’s acquisition of Warner Bros Discovery marks a defining moment for the entertainment industry. Whether it becomes the foundation for what Loomer calls an “Obama News Network” or simply a new phase of global streaming competition is a debate that will continue to unfold as regulators, politicians and audiences respond to a merger of unprecedented scale.
Article Summary: Activist laura loomer has warned that netflix’s acquisition of warner bros discovery could transform the streaming giant into what she calls the “obama news network. ” her claims resurfaced shortly after netflix announced that it had reached an agreement to purchase warner bros’ studio and streaming assets in a deal valued between $72 billion and $83 billion.

Article Title: Dubai Police adds Ferrari Purosangue, a 755hp beast, to its luxury patrol lineup
Article Text:
Dubai Police unveils 755HP Ferrari SUV for patrols / Image: @dubaipolice

Meet Dubai's Ferrari Purosangue Mansory

Strategic supercar policing

Beyond speed





Dubai Police has once again elevated its globally recognized luxury patrol fleet, unveiling an ultra-rare, customized Ferrari Purosangue Mansory, a 755-horsepower powerhouse that is one of only seven units modified worldwide. Marking 12 years of their strategic use of supercars, the Ministry of Interior confirmed the addition will be deployed in major tourist attractions like the Burj Khalifa to boost visibility, assist visitors, and underscore Dubai's commitment to security, innovation, and high-end excellence.Dubai Police has redefined luxury law enforcement once again by adding a highly customized Ferrari Purosangue Mansory to its world-famous fleet. This new patrol car is not just a high-performance vehicle; it is a global rarity, being one of only seven customized units of its kind in the entire world.The vehicle was specially modified by the German tuning house Mansory, giving it an aggressive yet sophisticated look perfectly suited for the streets of Dubai. The custom upgrades include a full carbon-fibre exterior kit, a sporty front bumper, a prominent rear wing, and custom forged FC.5 wheels.Inside, the cabin features a bespoke interior with premium leather and carbon-fibre trims, reflecting the city’s commitment to high-end excellence.The car’s performance is as impressive as its looks. This machine is powered by a massive 6.5-litre V12 engine, which produces an incredible 755 horsepower and 730Nm of torque. This power allows the patrol car to rocket from 0 to 100km/h in a mere 3.1 seconds and reach a top speed of 320km/h.The unveiling of the customized Ferrari took place at an anniversary event held in front of the iconic Emirates Towers. This celebration marked a significant milestone: 12 years of the Dubai Police’s luxury patrol fleet.The concept of using supercars for police patrols began in 2013 with the introduction of a Lamborghini, quickly turning the fleet into an international symbol of Dubai's innovative approach to security. Today, the luxury fleet has grown to an impressive 56 high-performance vehicles.The strategic purpose of these vehicles, including the new Ferrari, is not chase or speed, but enhanced visibility and global branding.Brigadier Saeed Al Hajri, Director of the General Department of Criminal Investigation, confirmed that the fleet reflects Dubai Police's commitment to innovation and service excellence. He stated that the new patrol will operate across major tourist hubs to assist visitors and strengthen community engagement.The luxury patrols are mobile service units, ensuring a highly visible and approachable presence where the police force can interact directly with residents and millions of visitors.The new Ferrari Purosangue Mansory will be immediately deployed in key tourist zones, including the Burj Khalifa, Mohammed bin Rashid Boulevard, and Jumeirah Beach Residence (JBR). By positioning these eye-catching cars in high-traffic areas, the police aim to bolster the sense of safety and showcase Dubai’s modern image.The fleet’s community role extends far beyond patrolling. Lieutenant Colonel Muhammad Abdulrahman noted that the patrol cars have participated in 1,184 events over the last three years. Crucially, they are also used to engage with the public on a personal level, having helped fulfil 49 wishes for children between 2023 and 2025, reinforcing the police’s focus on community happiness and positive interaction.
Article Summary: Dubai police unveils 755hp ferrari suv for patrols. Marking 12 years of their strategic use of supercars. New ferrari purosangue mansory will be immediately deployed in key tourist zones, including the burj khalifa, mohammed bin rashid boulevard and jumeirah beach residence.

Article Title: UAE: Abu Dhabi launches AI scholarship for undergraduate students at MBZUAI
Article Text:
Abu Dhabi’s Tahnoon bin Zayed Scholarship will support 350 MBZUAI undergraduates starting 2025–2026/Representative Image

Supporting talent and leadership





A unique undergraduate AI experience









Abu Dhabi has introduced the Tahnoon bin Zayed Scholarship in AI Excellence, a pioneering initiative to support outstanding undergraduate students at the Mohamed bin Zayed University of Artificial Intelligence (MBZUAI). Starting in the 2025–2026 academic year, the scholarship will benefit around 350 students over six years, offering financial support, global exposure, and resources to pursue innovation and entrepreneurship.The scholarship, guided by His Highness Sheikh Tahnoon bin Zayed Al Nahyan, Deputy Ruler of Abu Dhabi and Chairman of the Artificial Intelligence and Advanced Technology Council (AIATC), reflects the UAE’s broader vision to become a global hub for artificial intelligence and advanced technology, championed by President His Highness Sheikh Mohamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan.Selection will be merit-based, focusing on mathematical fluency, leadership skills, and an entrepreneurial mindset. In addition to financial aid, recipients will gain opportunities to represent the UAE at high profile youth events locally and globally and access resources to launch technology ventures. Sheikh Tahnoon emphasized that the scholarship is intended to empower young innovators to apply knowledge responsibly, serve humanity, and strengthen the UAE’s position as a leader in global innovation.MBZUAI’s Bachelor of Science in Artificial Intelligence is distinct from traditional AI programmes, integrating core technical training with leadership, entrepreneurship, and interdisciplinary study. Students engage with humanities, business, and liberal arts to develop ethical and critical perspectives essential for responsible AI development.The programme welcomes both national and international students and offers hands-on experience through industry placements, internships, and mentorships with leading organisations. MBZUAI also provides a world-class learning environment, including high-performance computational infrastructure, smart classrooms, incubation spaces, and faculty with expertise in academia and industry.Professor Eric Xing, MBZUAI President, noted that the scholarship will inspire students to grow and innovate with purpose. Khaldoon Khalifa Al Mubarak, Chairman of MBZUAI’s Board of Trustees, described it as an investment in human potential, shaping the next generation of global AI leaders.The Tahnoon bin Zayed Scholarship positions MBZUAI at the forefront of undergraduate AI education, combining rigorous academics, leadership development, and practical innovation opportunities, enabling students to drive the UAE’s AI future.
Article Summary: Abu dhabi’s tahnoon bin zayed scholarship will support 350 mbzuai undergraduates starting 2025–2026. In addition to financial aid, recipients will gain opportunities to represent the uae at high profile youth events locally and globally.

Article Title: 'Visible from space': Astronaut shares orbital view of Mecca from 400kms above earth; picture goes viral
Article Text:
(@astro_Pettit/X)

Capt Shubhanshu Shares What India Can Learn from ISS Successes





Nasa astronaut Don Pettit has captivated the internet with a striking photograph taken from space, showing the Saudi Arabian city of Mecca shimmering against the night. The orbital image reveals a brilliant central glow visible distinctly even from 400 kilometres above Earth.Don Pettit shared the image highlighting "Islam's holiest city" being visible even from space. "Orbital views of Mecca, Saudi Arabia. The bright spot in the centre is the Kaaba, Islam's holiest site, visible even from space," he wrote.The image captures Mecca’s vast urban landscape nestled within rugged valleys, with the Grand Mosque (Masjid al-Haram) centring the shot. At night, the city glows due to the light pollution caused by millions of LED and sodium lights whose brightness scatters through the atmosphere and is easily picked up by the ISS’s sensitive cameras.Users were left swooning over the "divine light" of the holy city as underscored by one of the netizens. "From orbit, the Kaaba's glow hits different—like Earth's own eternal nightlight for the soul. Divine flex," they wrote.While other users thanked the astronaut in different words for the aerial sight he shared.Pettit, an accomplished astrophotographer and chemical engineer, has built a remarkable reputation for translating the technical challenges of space photography into artistic masterpieces that blend science with visual poetry.Pettit's photographic portfolio documents remarkable phenomena across multiple dimensions.His captures include stunning star trails above Earth's cloud formations, dramatic lightning storms over continental rainforests, auroras dancing across polar regions, and unexpected human elements
Article Summary: Astronaut don pettit has shared a striking photograph taken from space. The image shows the saudi arabian city of mecca shimmering against the night. At night, the city glows due to the light pollution caused by millions of led and sodium lights.

Article Title: 'Sexploitation': 120K security cameras in South Korea hacked; 4 arrested for selling content
Article Text:
An AI-generated image





Four people have been arrested in South Korea for hacking more than 120,000 internet-connected surveillance cameras in homes and businesses and stealing footage to produce illegally filmed sexually exploitative content, the Washington Post reported citing officials.The Korean National Police Agency said the suspects operated independently and targeted a variety of IP cameras, including those in private homes, karaoke rooms, a pilates studio, and a gynaecologist’s clinic.Two of the suspects were responsible for more than 60% of the videos posted on an overseas-based website where the footage was sold. One suspect reportedly received around $24,000 in virtual assets for 545 videos, while another earned $12,000 for 648 videos. Another suspect allegedly hacked 70,000 cameras and sold 648 videos for 18 million won in virtual assets, the BBC reported.According to the NY Post, authorities have not disclosed the manufacturers of the hacked cameras. The website where the footage was sold, as well as those who viewed the videos, is also under investigation. Police have arrested three people suspected of purchasing or viewing the stolen material.One suspect is additionally charged with producing sexually exploitative content of children and adolescents, though police said this footage had been stored but not sold. All four are charged with hacking IP cameras, and two face further charges of selling illegally filmed sexual content.Authorities emphasised that weak passwords played a key role in the hack, with many cameras using simple or sequential combinations, making them vulnerable to cyberattacks. The National Police Agency urged all IP camera users to set complex, original passwords, update them regularly, and be cautious about using devices manufactured overseas, which may not meet local security standards.IP cameras, often used for monitoring children, pets, and businesses, have become popular globally due to their low cost but are increasingly targeted by hackers. Previous incidents include a 2019 US case in Mississippi where a man hacked a child’s Ring camera and harassed the child via the device’s two-way talk function, and a 2024 FTC fine on Verkada after footage from 150,000 cameras, including those in hospitals and schools, was stolen, reported The Washington Post.“Above all, it is crucial and effective for individual users who have installed IP cameras in homes or business premises to remain vigilant and immediately and regularly change their access passwords,” the BBC cited the National Police Agency as saying.According to the NY Post, South Korea has a long-standing problem with “molka,” or hidden cameras, which have been used to produce illegal sexual content in public spaces. Between 2011 and 2022, police made nearly 50,000 arrests related to illicit filming in hotels, pools, and public bathrooms. The widespread use of hidden cameras has also been a catalyst for the country’s feminist movement.Police have visited or notified victims at 58 locations, providing guidance on deleting footage and strengthening security. They are also cooperating with foreign authorities to investigate the website operator and users who accessed the stolen material. “IP camera hacking and illegal filming inflict immense suffering on victims and are therefore serious offences. We will eradicate them through vigorous investigations,” BBC quoted Park Woo-hyun, cyber investigation chief at the National Police Agency.
Article Summary: Four people have been arrested in south korea for hacking more than 120,000 internet-connected surveillance cameras in homes and businesses. Two of the suspects were responsible for more than 60% of the videos posted on an overseas-based website where the footage was sold.

Article Title: ‘Behavioural cocaine’: Australia defends social media ban for kids; no TikTok, Instagram for under-16s
Article Text:
AP file photo





Australia’s government on Wednesday justified its social media ban for under-16s, arguing it will protect young people from being pulled into an online “purgatory.”“With one law, we can protect Generation Alpha from being sucked into purgatory by the predatory algorithms described by the man who created the feature as behavioural cocaine,” communications minister Anika Wells said, as cited by AFP.Australia is set to impose a ban from December 10, preventing users under 16 from accessing a range of major social media platforms and websites, including Facebook, Instagram, TikTok and YouTube.The eSafety Commissioner must be satisfied that social media platforms have taken “reasonable steps” to prevent users under 16 from holding accounts, or they could face fines of up to $49.5 million. The government has said the list of affected platforms is dynamic, meaning other services could be added later if young users shift to them and similar risks arise.The commissioner has indicated that platforms like Lemon8 could be added to the list and would be required to remove accounts for under-16 users.Australian prime minister Anthony Albanese has described social media as “a platform for peer pressure, a driver of anxiety, a vehicle for scammers and, worst of all, a tool for online predators.”Meta, the parent company of Facebook and Instagram, declined to disclose how it plans to identify users it “understands” to be under 16, saying doing so could potentially alert teens on how to bypass the ban.Snapchat said it will use account behavioural signals along with the birth dates provided on user accounts to identify those believed to be under 16.TikTok stated it will adopt a “multi-layered approach to age assurance” using “various technologies and signals” to verify users’ ages, adding that it will share further details ahead of December 10, as cited by the Guardian.YouTube on Wednesday criticised the ban and described the world-first legislation as “rushed” and unrealistic."Most importantly, this law will not fulfil its promise to make kids safer online, and will, in fact, make Australian kids less safe on YouTube," YouTube public policy manager Rachel Lord stated, as cited by AFP.YouTube, one of the world’s most-visited websites, had initially been exempted from the ban so children could continue accessing educational content.However, in July, the Australian government reversed course, citing the need to protect young users from “predatory algorithms.”
Article Summary: Australia is set to impose a ban from december 10, preventing users under 16 from accessing a range of major social media platforms and websites. The government has said the list of affected platforms is dynamic, meaning other services could be added later if young users shift to them and similar risks arise.
